MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Database tools - administration, data synchronization, database versioning
Site.Site_Description_250: Database tools - administration, query designer, database model editor, data synchronization, database versioning. Custom plugin development.
Site.Site_Description_450: Database tools - administration, query designer, database model editor, data synchronization, database versioning. Custom plugin development.
Site.Site_Keywords: database, manager, organizer, explorer, oracle, mysql, mssql, sqlite, effiproz, sqlserver, jet, access, postgre, tsql, sql, backup

DatAdmin Professional is shareware, you can use it 30 days for free, than it is neccessary to buy or uninstall it.

The USER must assume the entire risk of using the SOFTWARE, and author of DatAdmin shall have no liability to the user of DatAdmin or any other third-party for any damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, any economic or data loss, even if such loss was foreseeable by author of DatAdmin.

Press_Release.Press_Release: Prague, Czech Republic, Nov 20, 2011 JenaSoft announced release 5.4.0 of database management tool for Windows, DatAdmin. The main improvement of this version is support of charts. Also it brings lot of smaller improvements. DatAdmin supports MS SQL, MySQL, Oracle, Postgre SQL, SQLite, EffiProz and MS Access databases. It supports all common-used database administration tasks, like database browsing, creating backups, import, export, query designer and it adds lot of original features, which makes it more powerful and effective than many competitors. DatAdmin is available in two basic editions: DatAdmin Personal, which is free, DatAdmin Professional for EUR 40/$60 per installation. Also there are two products based on DatAdmin, Database Versioning and Data Synchronization, free trials are offered. For more informations please visit DatAdmin homepage, http://www.datadmin.com JenaSoft is a Czech software company founded in 2006, specialized in database software.
Press_Release.Headline: DatAdmin 5.4.0, database management tool for Windows, is released
Press_Release.Summary: JenaSoft announced release 5.4.0 of database administration tool DatAdmin. DatAdmin offers easy and quick to use database administration tools in intuitive enviroment

English.Keywords: database, manager, organizer, explorer, oracle, mysql, mssql, sqlite, sqlserver, jet, access, postgre, tsql, sql, backup
English.Char_Desc_80: Quick and easy database administration for Windows for many popular engines
English.Char_Desc_250: Quick and easy database administration, natively supports Oracle,MSSQL,MySQL,SQLite,Postgre SQL,MS Access,EffiProz. Main features: Manage database schema and data. Export and import, scheduling. Query builder. Synchronize databases.
English.Char_Desc_450: Quick and easy database administration, natively supports Oracle, MSSQL, MySQL, SQLite, Postgre SQL, MS Access, EffiProz. Main features: Manage database schema and data. Creating and restoring backups. Export and import, can be saved as job and scheduled. Transfer data between databases, tables and data files (supported formats are XML, CSV, HTML, Excel). Query builder. Synchronize databases.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Quick and easy database administration, natively supports Oracle, MSSQL, MySQL, SQLite, Postgre SQL, MS Access, EffiProz. Main features: Creating and restoring backups. Transfer data between databases, tables and data files (supported formats are XML, CSV, HTML, Excel). Open exported data in external application, save to FTP. Saving data transfer jobs, jobs scheduler. Edit database schema, tables, views, view, triggers, stored procedures. View, edit, filter and sort data in tables. Display data from referenced tables, master-detail views. Command-line interface. Database modeling, reverse engineering. Database diagrams, customizable graphical styles. Migrate database between all supported platforms. Advanced SQL editor, syntax highlighting, code completion, SQL script manager. Database structure synchronization. Flexible generating SQL from tables, views and from data Query builder, query history. Database object dependency browser. Reusable table perspectives, view related columns in data browser. Configurable dashboards, widget designer. Visualise result sets in charts.
